199.40.0.0/27

3 bit= 2>3
2>3=8
256/8=32

1. 199.40.0.0->199.40.0.31
2. 199.40.0.32->199.40.0.63
3. 199.40.0.64->199.40.0.95
4. 199.40.0.96->199.40.0.127
5. 199.40.0.128->199.40.0.159
6. 199.40.0.160->199.40.0.191
7. 199.40.0.192->199.40.0.223
8. 199.40.0.224->199.40.0.255

160.160.0.0/22

1. 160.160.0.0->160.160.3.255
2. 160.160.4.0->160.160.7.255
3. 160.160.8.0->160.160.11.255
4. 160.160.12.0->160.160.15.255
5. 160.160.16.0->160.160.19.255
6. 160.160.20.0->160.160.23.255
